Description: Every {numberOfAttacks} attacks fire an explosive arrow instead that deals {damage}% damage on explosion.
Fire {numberOfArrows} instead. Each arrow deals {damage}% damage.
Snares and damage enemies overtime for {damage}% damage.
Apply a stack to enemies every {stackTime}s. Every {maxStacks} stacks stun the enemy for {stunDuration}s.
Heavily increase damage to enemies by {damage}%. Enemies are no longer snared, they are slowed by {slowDown}% instead.

During {duration}s gain {attackSpeed}% attack speed and {critChance}% crit. Durint the duration, every succesfull attack builds a stack of "True shot". When the ultimate ends, the ranger releases all accumulated stacks in a rapid succession of devastating shots that deal {stackDamage}% increased damage per stack.
